meanings.definition: A medical condition characterized by inflammation and irritation of the skin.
meanings.sent1: My sister's eczemas are causing her a lot of discomfort.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a cream to help with my eczemas.
meanings.sent3: Even though they were just eczemas, they seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her eczemas were like tiny volcanoes erupting on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The red, itchy eczemas made it hard for him to sleep at night.
